PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-11052011-09-29AANDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirst Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act
SubjectFinancing Secured by Other Revenues Regulations
PrecisFINANCING SECURED BY OTHER REVENUES REGULATIONS, in order to support the First Nations Finance Authority and the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act regime, Regulations have been made which will allow for the securitization of various other revenue streams in addition to the property tax revenues currently permitted for this purpose under the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0201 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment

subject: Financing Secured by Other Revenues Regulations
precis: FINANCING SECURED BY OTHER REVENUES REGULATIONS, in order to support the First Nations Finance Authority and the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act regime, Regulations have been made which will allow for the securitization of various other revenue streams in addition to the property tax revenues currently permitted for this purpose under the Act.
